remarks: Implication of a class being a terminal object.  (Contributed by AV, 18-Apr-2020.)
statement:
isinitoi.b $e |- B = ( Base ` C ) $.
isinitoi.h $e |- H = ( Hom ` C ) $.
isinitoi.c $e |- ( ph -> C e. Cat ) $.
istermoi $p |- ( ( ph /\ O e. ( TermO ` C ) ) -> ( O e. B /\ A. b e. B E! h h e. ( b H O ) ) ) $.
$d B b $.
$d C b h $.
$d O b h $.
